final_answer:
The humor in this image comes from the contrast between the two panels labeled "YES" and "BUT." 

On the left, the "YES" panel shows clean and sparkling shoes, suggesting neatness and hygiene. On the right, the "BUT" panel shows socks with angry faces and odor lines, humorously implying that while the shoes may be clean, the socks inside are quite the opposite. 

This contrast between the exterior appearance (clean shoes) and the hidden reality (smelly socks) creates a comic and relatable situation, playing on the idea that things are not always as they seem.
